short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Space Nation: Orion is a game on X - Pilot a ship, complete missions on X, build your base, and earn rewards.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Space Nation: Orion is a lite game available on social platforms like X, Telegram, and Discord, as part of the Space Nation Franchise. Socialize, play, and earn rewards.

As a player, you will pilot a spaceship on X to discover and complete engaging missions. Gather resources to construct your own X base. Visit the bases of other captains and interact with them. Space Nation: Orion is a extension that combines NFTs, socializing, and gaming.
